byline.original: By DAVID E. SANGER and RICK GLADSTONE

abstract: Satellite photos collected by Center for Strategic and International Studies show what appear to be China's construction of military aircraft hangars on contested Spratly Islands in South China Sea.

keywords.value: Center for Strategic and International Studies
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: Satellite imagery shows China has been building reinforced hangars on the disputed Spratly Islands that can easily accommodate warplanes.
snippet: Satellite imagery shows China has been building reinforced hangars on the disputed Spratly Islands that can easily accommodate warplanes....

headline.main: New Photos Cast Doubt on China’s Vow Not to Militarize Disputed Islands
headline.print_headline: Photos Raise Questions on China’s Promise Not to Militarize Disputed Islands
